data.text:
Davis Biographical information Alias Pierce Status Alive Occupation(s) Monarch Security Affiliation(s) Monarch Solutions Resides Riverport, Massachusetts Physical description Gender Male Nationality American Hair color Brown (Graying) Eye color Brown Game information First Appearance "Deception" Last Appearance "Deception" Actor Ric Reitz[1]

Commander Davis is a Monarch Solutions Security officer that worked under Martin Hatch.[2] During the events of October 2016, he worked with Hatch to sabotage Paul Serene's Chronon treatment in Henry Kim's Lab.

Biography[]

Events of Quantum Break[]

"Deception"[]

Following Jack Joyce's attack on the Monarch Gala on Gull Island and the kidnapping of Sofia Amaral[3], Davis guarded and kept watch over Martin Hatch while the island was one lockdown.[2] When Charlie Wincott was able to escape Liam Burke and Fiona Miller, he returned to the gala venue where Davis was guarding Hatch. Davis allowed Charlie entrance when he reported he was there to see Hatch.

Shortly after his meeting with Charlie, Hatch orders Davis to head for Henry Kim's lab and prepare for the next stage of his sabotage plan. Davis and his team set explosives up in Dr. Kim's laboratory. When Hatch plants fingerprint evidence against Dr. Amaral, Davis and his men are in the process of finalizing the set up.

Davis and his team are killed or severely injured in the explosion Hatch triggered following his departure from the lab. When Commander Pierce and his team arrived on the scene, Davis was the only survivor found severely burned and bloodied from the explosion.
